TopicTitle: New NASA Venus mission in design makes me want: Foldable wings, robotics

Articles.Content:
Interesting venus atmosphere flight and sampe idea, straight from NASA:

https://phys.org/news/2024-01-nasa-sample-mission-venus.html

Robotics is a thing I think a lot of players really want. For eve it would be very great to have propellors, which give players a great way to easy transport stuff between colonies. Also stuff like hinges, pistons, crane with rope etc. would be great
airships would be cool as well especially for planets with thick atmospheres like eve and jool
